alert.note: Alert for Ward (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 07 at 12:29PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of north central North Dakota, including the following county, Ward. * WHEN...Until 230 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1225 PM CDT, trained weather spotters reported minor street flooding on the western side of Minot. Between 0.5 and 1.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Minot. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
